Utilities

Sparkline output

Display concise, reactive inline bar, line, or dot charts.

Arguments

id

A character string specifying the id of the sparkline output.

type

One of "bar", "dot", or "line" specifying the type of chart to render, defaults to "bar".

labels

If TRUE, the first and last value of the sparkline data are used as labels, defaults to TRUE.

values

A numeric vector of values specifying the sparkline data points. Bar and dot sparklines expect values to be between 0 and 100 and line sparklines expect values to be between 0 and 10.

...

Additional named arguments passed as HTML attributes to the parent element.

env

The environment in which to evaluate values.

quoted

One of TRUE or FALSE specifying if values is a quoted expression.
